body:
i'm thankful for rihanna at coachella, [rolling blunts on her bodyguard's head](https://twitter.com/Ioveonthebrain/status/984919253630545920), blissing out [on lady gaga](https://twitter.com/fkajack/status/984933363319496706), and in [the front row for beyoncé.](https://twitter.com/DionneGrant/status/985864379404046336) 

i'm thankful for [how reba mcentire always looks like she successfully played a prank on you](https://twitter.com/louisvirtel/status/985693719390076928).

i'm thankful for this person on youtube who cuts together [just the reaction shots from talk shows](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrX01qiKiVieSrzX1iQn52Q/videos), especially for [this one of kris and kanye](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ErQO3Z4vhwI). i'm thankful we've finally earned [blinking\_black\_guy.gif](https://twitter.com/austin_walker/status/986061908934569985).

i'm thankful to find out that [other people also think of the world in the way i do](https://twitter.com/prozdkp/status/98599718100). i'm thankful for [when an astrology column makes me feel known](https://broadly.vice.com/en_us/article/paxv8v/scorpio-relationship-to-weed-zodiac-sign).

i'm thankful that on twitter, i can make [polls](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/986076382265532416) where [you have to agree with me to participate in the poll](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/986076742795366403). i'm thankful for twitter, even though it feels as though [it has ruined my mind](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/986062401584943104).

i'm thankful for these incredibly accurate depictions of what d and i's lives would look like in a nature documentary: [1](https://twitter.com/AlannaBennett/status/982085344161161221), [2](https://twitter.com/AlannaBennett/status/982085741927976960).

i'm thankful for [this musing on dog poop](https://twitter.com/comethrugirl/status/985310055322083329?s=12). i'm thankful for [this other musing on dog poop](https://twitter.com/kept_simple/status/985332452515352576).

i'm thankful for the idea that [baths are reverse boats](https://twitter.com/miragonz/status/985659768948736000). i'm thankful for the phenomenon of [crown shyness](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7oXpxU-oRbM).

i'm thankful for [patricia lockwood on annie dillard](https://twitter.com/colleentie/status/984079560185647106). i'm thankful there is a new playlist "_[for laying in the tall grass under the bright spring sun with someone cute](https://open.spotify.com/user/joshdwinters/playlist/1R4wGqzkFsODDnSL724N7R)_" from my favorite playlist maker josh winters.
